MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 10-NOV-2020 14:11.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. affecting properties in Carse View and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.11pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still on site investigating reports of grounded overhead line equipment at Thistlebank Cottage affecting the rest of our customers without power. We still expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.13pm on Tuesday 10th of November 2020.
